column3: “I am typically a sativa\sativa dom hybrid user due to issues with depression, but WOW is this Martian Candy a great way to shake things up. Very relaxing chill strain, good for putting a smile on a depressed face.”

“When I try a strain, I'm looking for relief of fibro symptoms. This is one of the best I've tried for it. A single puff or two during the daytime leaves me pretty functional with this fantastic lightness in my limbs and far less pain. Great relief from pain and fatigue. I find it easier to move, and this generally chills out my nervous system and leaves me with only a slightly fuzzy brain and a great mood.

The unusu...”

“GOOD LORD DUDE. World peace would happen if everyone smoked this strain. Happiness is just a whole new thing. Driving is so beautiful on the open country roads. You can focus. Pain is GONE. Daydreaming like nobodies business but still able to multitask. The realms I am getting stuck in are outta this world. So much fun in my head. But I'm able to cook dinner and bop to Steve Earle and Alabama. 
Do yourself a favor, g...”
“My favorite strain so far! Great taste and amazing body high. Plus I feel super happy. Couldn't ask for more!”

“Very mellow. This is my new go-to strain for overwhelming in-law events. Relaxed me enough to deal with the 25+ people events, without any of them having a clue that I was high the entire day. 1 nice big hit every 60-90 minutes was great.

Used in PAX 3 vape. It had a nice taste to it. Earthy with a touch of sweet.

Side note - it dramatically reduced sinus infection pressure and pain for my nephew. Helped him far mo...”
“This is one bud I couldn't stop talking about once I tried it. Definitely in my top 5 . The taste, the high, the bud was all perfect for me”
“Amazing, would highly recommend! A good starter for newbies.”

“This bud is wonderful. I like to smoke a bowl before the gym, maybe after smoke a j with a friend. 3 regular smokers couldn’t get through a whole j. It’s beautiful, smells amazing, the nugs are small but they pack a punch. If I smoke too much of this before bed I wake up still high. I definitely pushed myself harder at the gym because of this, and still very social. Definitely heavy on the eyes. I’m in love.”
“🔥🔥🔥🔥  2Sweet approved”
“definitely a good strain. the bud is a keef soaked sponge and burns beautiful giving you a can do anything feeling. ready to go out sleep or stay in gpod overall bud”
“This is one bud I couldn't stop talking about once I tried it. Definitely in my top 5 . The taste, the high, the bud was all perfect for me”
“a bit over powering in my case im a lazy person in general but rolling a blunt kept me seated and calm without any back pain great strain”
“A bowl of this rocked my world, perfect for my condition.”

“This is a great strain that really stands out.  If I’ve given any strain more than three stars, then I find it to be extraordinary in some way.  The euphoria was outstanding, with all kinds of tingling and a fantastic sense of well being.  It didn’t make me sleepy, and the taste was nice as well.

Im a daily user, I like to try as many new strains as I can... but I will definitely buy this one again.”
“It’s pretty chill.”

“This is a very relaxing strain that made my body feel tingly and warm in a matter of minutes. One thing that stood out about this strain was it's positive effects on my mood. I was pretty stressed out when I started smoking and by the time I took my third hit I was in a much more peaceful mood.”
“Definitely some real good OG. Great high! 💪😤👍”

“wow this strain was actually amazing. had been a while since I had such a nice Hybrid. it's quite a specific high every single time. hits in the mouth and teeth first... then it goes up to your forehead and you feel a slight oreakssure and eyesight starts going. followed by it going down to your chest. and that's when it starts hitting you like an Edible. then it extends out to your arms and they feel numb and heavy....”
“great! really interesting looking and smells and tastes great and no negatives. relaxing and chill feeling”
“This stain is great. Made me super relaxed and happy but not tired.”
“Delicious”
“This is indeed my favorite strain ! Beautiful aroma , beautiful high ! I have tremors , diabetes , and trouble sleeping ! I look for it ! Doesn't seem to get around enough !”

“Cool name, but that's about it. Copped a g of martian candy og shatter. Very unique smell and taste. Reminds me of eucalyptus. The high is just too mellow and weak for my taste. I felt focused and quite mellow but like I said the high is on the underwhelming side. No dry eyes or dry mouth tho.
Potency is meh. I don't consider my tolerance to be heavyweight at all. Good strain for beginners”
